txt.en: 'Oh, aren't we the lucky one! I didn't peg you for a fisherman, [placeholder]. Why don't you hang around here some more? Maybe that luck will rub off on me!'\n\nShe chuckles and goes back to what she was doing.
Tassila can be found at the river docks in Arhaim.\n\nYou should bring the trout to Tassila.
Fishing poles can be found at the river docks in Arhaim.\n\nYou should check the fishing poles for bites.
Fishing is a large part of life in Arhaim, and the villagers have asked for your help reeling in today's catch.
There are no fish on the line

'Hello traveller. Can I help you?'

You explain that you are here to help in anyway you can to earn Garsind's trust.

'Well, I'm not one to turn away free help! Plenty to do around here. See those fishing poles? They're baited and cast, just waiting for a bite. Why don't you go check and see if there's any fish on the lines?'
